topics.body:
"@Bryon":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5431e7db63687268e0eb0000#post_5431e7db63687268e0eb0000
We were watching Frozen and my grandmother ADORES that movie. I brought up my personal opinion that Beauty & The Beast was a much better movie and it escalted from there. Not that Frozen is bad in any way, it's just not as absolutely perfect in every imaginable way as Beauty & The Beast.
